i sew my own clothes.
I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
My Impala needs a new paint job and I'm going to start working on that this weekend.
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to watch foreign films and sew my own clothes.
Sounds cool. I just spent my birthday alone, relaxing at home.
I like the freedom to do whatever I want when I live alone.
I'm not so good at being alone. I usually get bored and start thinking about work.
I don't have any siblings, so I'm used to being alone.
That must have been lonely at times.
Sometimes, but I always have my dog to keep me company.
I'm not really a dog person, but I can understand why people like them.
I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
That's great. I'm sure he'll appreciate it.
I hope so. I've had him for a few years now, and I really want him to be happy.
I'm sure he is happy. You seem like a great owner.
